thread.title: 20 Makeup Artists You Need to Follow on Instagram
thread.title_full: 20 Makeup Artists You Need to Follow on Instagram

author: Carly Cardellino
title: 20 Makeup Artists You Need to Follow on Instagram
text:
Type keyword(s) to search 20 Makeup Artists You Need to Follow on Instagram 
You're guaranteed to learn a thing or two ‚Äî or 20 ‚Äî while getting a sneak peek behind the scenes at your favorite celebs. Instagram, @patrickTa By Carly Cardellino Feb 22, 2017 1. Pat McGrath: She's literally applied makeup to every single celebrity and model you've ever cared about in life. Not to mention, this P&G global creative design director's Insta is one of the most vibrant things you'll ever see thanks to her genius mind and glittery makeup line. A post shared by Pat McGrath (@patmcgrathreal) on Dec 9, 2016 at 5:11am PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below A post shared by Pat McGrath (@patmcgrathreal) on Sep 30, 2016 at 9:14am PDT 2. Charlotte Tilbury: Cara Delevingne, Emily Ratajkowski, Sienna Miller, and Jourdan Dunn are among some of her clients. Tilbury also has an eponymous incredible makeup line that will give you the skin/eyes/lips/contour of your dreams. A post shared by Charlotte Tilbury (@ctilburymakeup) on May 13, 2015 at 1:17pm PDT A post shared by Charlotte Tilbury (@ctilburymakeup) on Feb 21, 2017 at 3:33am PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 3. Joyce Bonelli (center): This makeup artist keeps up with the Kardashians like no other ‚Äî she also has two adorable new twins that she posts whom are impossibly cute too! A post shared by CEO: jOYCEBONELLi COSM√âTIQUES¬Æ (@joycebonelli) on Sep 3, 2015 at 4:31pm PDT A post shared by CEO: jOYCEBONELLi COSM√âTIQUES¬Æ (@joycebonelli) on Nov 3, 2016 at 6:50pm PDT Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 4. Hung Vanngo: His makeup brushes touch the faces of Selena Gomez, the VS girls, Cindy Crawford, and Kate Bosworth, to name a few. A post shared by Hung Vanngo (@hungvanngo) on Jul 25, 2015 at 12:31am PDT A post shared by Hung Vanngo (@hungvanngo) on Feb 8, 2017 at 5:48pm PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 5. Patrick Ta: He counts Jenna Dewan-Tatum, Gigi Hadid, Jessica Alba, and Shay Mitchell, and Camila Alves as some of his closest clients. A post shared by Patrick Ta (@patrickta) on Feb 10, 2017 at 7:50pm PST A post shared by Patrick Ta (@patrickta) on Jan 11, 2017 at 3:53pm PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 6. Michael Anthony: Models Jasmine Sanders, Herieth Paul, and HoYeon Jung, and celebs like Rita Ora, Allison Williams, Katy Perry, and Victoria Justice have him on speed dial. But what'll really blow your mind about Manthony (his nickname) is the way he paints faces and the makeup concepts he dreams up. ‚ú® A post shared by MICHAEL ANTHONY (@manthony783) on Nov 1, 2016 at 9:36am PDT A post shared by MICHAEL ANTHONY (@manthony783) on Nov 23, 2015 at 10:18am PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 7. Violette: Chances are you'll catch her creating editorial masterpieces over dolling up celebs, but regardless of whom she's making up, you can bet they'll have the more unique look around. Not only is Violette a genius when it comes to coming up with interesting makeup looks, she's obsessed with glitter just like you. A post shared by Violette (@violette_fr) on Oct 29, 2016 at 6:21am PDT A post shared by Violette (@violette_fr) on Oct 4, 2016 at 9:45am PDT Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 8. Mylah Morales: She gets Rihanna glam on a regular basis. Enough said. A post shared by Glaminator Mylah Morales (@mylahmorales) on Jun 25, 2015 at 9:01am PDT A post shared by Glaminator Mylah Morales (@mylahmorales) on May 22, 2016 at 7:06pm PDT Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 9. Robin Black: You'll never find her in an Insta photo because she's also the killer photographer taking the pictures, but be prepared to get some insane makeup inspiration from this artist's feed. A post shared by BEAUTY IS BORING üíã (@beautyisboring_) on Dec 27, 2014 at 8:57pm PST A post shared by BEAUTY IS BORING üíã (@beautyisboring_) on Nov 30, 2016 at 9:01pm PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 10. Sir John: This L'Or√®al makeup artist's roster includes Beyonc√©, Serena Williams, Soo Joo Park, Joan Smalls, Khlo√© Kardashian, and more, and just might be the nicest (and most humble) human on earth. A post shared by S I R J O H N (@sirjohnofficial) on Apr 6, 2016 at 1:01pm PDT A post shared by S I R J O H N (@sirjohnofficial) on Feb 16, 2017 at 4:23pm PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 11. Vincent Oquendo: He enhances the already gorgeous faces of models like Kaia Gerber, Barbara Pavlin, Ashley Graham, Emily Ratajkowski, Kendall Jenner, Elsa Hosk, Stella Maxwell, Bella Hadid, Soo Joo Park ‚Äî literally he does every models' makeup. A post shared by Vincent Oquendo (@makeupvincent) on Feb 14, 2017 at 10:17am PST A post shared by Vincent Oquendo (@makeupvincent) on Feb 13, 2017 at 8:44am PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 12. Mario Dedivanovic: You know him and love him, he's Kim Kardashian's main man and is king of the #MasterClass. A post shared by MARIO (@makeupbymario) on Feb 14, 2017 at 12:07pm PST A post shared by MARIO (@makeupbymario) on Jan 20, 2017 at 8:22am PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 13. Mary Phillips (far right): She gives JLo that glow ‚Äî plus, Britney Spears, Chrissy Teigen, Kendall, Kylie, Hannah Davis, and a slew of other celebs turn to Mary to get red-carpet ready. A post shared by Mary Phillips (@1maryphillips) on Oct 3, 2016 at 6:27pm PDT A post shared by Mary Phillips (@1maryphillips) on Dec 31, 2016 at 9:22am PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 14. Hrush Achemyan: Kendall, Kylie, Khlo√©, Kim, Kourtney, Karreuche, Cassie and bunch of other babes all rely on Hrush for selfie-approved makeup that's flawless AF. A post shared by Hrush Achemyan (@styledbyhrush) on Jun 8, 2015 at 10:48am PDT A post shared by Hrush Achemyan (@styledbyhrush) on Jan 28, 2017 at 6:59pm PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 15. Ariel Tejada: Depending on the day, Ariel takes care of the Kardashian klan's makeup needs, including mama Kris. That bronze eye and burgundy lip on Kylie tho! üòç üòç üòç A post shared by Ariel Tejada (@makeupbyariel) on Jul 11, 2016 at 2:42pm PDT A post shared by Ariel Tejada (@makeupbyariel) on Feb 16, 2017 at 12:46pm PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 16. Beau Nelson: He delicately handles the faces of Kristen Stewart, Nicole Richie, Gigi Hadid ‚Äî the list goes on! Fun fact: He also take killer photos, so if you need a photographer slash makeup artist, he's your man. A post shared by Beau Nelson (@beau_nelson) on Jul 10, 2016 at 4:08pm PDT A post shared by Beau Nelson (@beau_nelson) on Nov 17, 2016 at 10:42am PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 17. Kate Lee: She's one of Chanel's makeup artists and has lacquered the faces of Sienna Miller, Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, Diane Kruger, Chanel Iman and more. A post shared by Kate Lee (@kateleemakeup) on Jan 9, 2017 at 8:40am PST A post shared by Kate Lee (@kateleemakeup) on Dec 5, 2016 at 2:00pm PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 18. Pati Dubroff: She's worked with Miley Cyrus, Cameron Diaz, Taylor Swift, Angelina Jolie, and Dakota Johnson, and Zoe Kravitz to name a few. A post shared by patidubroffüíã (@patidubroff) on Jan 31, 2017 at 6:36am PST A post shared by patidubroffüíã (@patidubroff) on Feb 9, 2017 at 4:32pm PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 19. Tom Pecheux: Gisele B√ºndchen, Bella Hadid, Cara Delevingne, and more call on him to create gorgeous looks on their already beautiful faces. A post shared by tompecheux (@tompecheux) on Dec 1, 2016 at 2:27am PST A post shared by tompecheux (@tompecheux) on Feb 16, 2017 at 8:50am PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 20. Rob Scheppy: He makes up the faces of Kendall, Kourtney Kardashian, Ciara, Kim Kardashian, Mariah Carey, and more. A post shared by Artist (@robscheppy) on Nov 3, 2015 at 1:31pm PST A post shared by Artist (@robscheppy) on Oct 27, 2016 at 9:02am PDT Follow Carly on Instagram and Twitter . Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
